class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, a: List[int], b: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(a)
        db = [0] * (n)
        db[0] = b[0]
        for i in range(1, n):
            db[i] = b[i] - b[i-1]
        # \sum_{0~i} db[i] = b[i]
        # for i in range(1, n):
        #     db[i] += db[i-1]
        # print(db)
        da = [0] * n
        da[0] = a[0]
        for i in range(1, n):
            da[i] = a[i] - a[i-1]
        posi = neg = ans = 0
        for i in range(n):
            if da[i] != db[i]:
                if da[i] < db[i]:
                    if da[i] + posi >= db[i]:
                        posi -= db[i] - da[i]
                    else:
                        da[i] += posi
                        posi = 0
                        ans += db[i] - da[i]
                        neg += db[i] - da[i]
                else: # da[i] > db[i]
                    if da[i] - neg <= db[i]:
                        neg -= da[i] - db[i]
                    else:
                        da[i] -= neg
                        neg = 0
                        ans += da[i] - db[i]
                        posi += da[i] - db[i]
            # if da[i] + posi < db[i]:
            #     if da[i] + posi >= db[i]:
            #         neg -= neg - da[i] - posi + db[i]
            #     else:
            #         neg = 0
            #         D = db[i] - da[i] - posi
            #         posi += D
            #         ans += D
            # elif da[i] + posi - neg > db[i]:
            #     if da[i] - neg <= db[i]:
            #         posi -= 
                
        return ans
